actions.text: On agreeing to the Lofgren amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 256 (Roll No. 106).

description: Amendment sought to add a new section to the bill which would have prevented children or parents from being compelled to testify against each another in Federal civil and criminal proceedings.
purpose: An amendment to add a new section to the bill which would prevent children or parents from being compelled to testify against one another in federal civil and criminal proceedings.
